channel.title: Art on Javier's Data Site
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Javier's Data Site

item.title: Robots and Modern Art Installations
item.description: If you’re based in SoCal, I highly recommend a visit to the Telestron installation (Feb 23 - March 28). This is an immersive, futuristic light show put on by VTProDesign and GMUNK. I love the intersection of art+technology and these robots do not disappoint! “A pair of robot arms project light patterns onto each other and all surfaces of the room during a seven-minute show.” Source: Telestron
